channel.title: CVE Feed for beancount -- beancount/fava
channel.description: The latest CVEs for beancount -- beancount/fava

item.title: CVE-2022-2514|2024-08-03T00:39:08.013Z -- beancount -- beancount%2Ffava
item.description: The time and filter parameters in Fava prior to v1.22 are vulnerable to reflected XSS due to the lack of escaping of error messages which contained the parameters in verbatim.

item.title: CVE-2022-2523|2024-08-03T00:39:08.063Z -- beancount -- beancount%2Ffava
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Reflected in GitHub repository beancount/fava prior to 1.22.2.

item.title: CVE-2022-2589|2024-08-03T00:39:08.261Z -- beancount -- beancount%2Ffava
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Reflected in GitHub repository beancount/fava prior to 1.22.3.
